name: Boat Burgers
author: lunarmoodring
summary: My grandma taught me this recipe its very basic for those that don't have much money and need to stretch meals. Though it is so good it doesn't last only a couple days!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix ground beef and egg together in a large bowl; add oatmeal, ketchup, mustard, salt, and pepper
Arrange hot dog buns on a baking sheet
Spoon ground beef mixture into each bun
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes
Add an American cheese slice to each 'boat burger'; continue baking until ground beef is fully cooked and buns are crispy, 10 to 12 more minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C)
